column1: File:The Lord of the Rings - The Fellowship of the Ring - Albert Dreary.jpg
Albert Dreary was a drunken man outside the Prancing Pony inn in Bree seen crunching a carrot in The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
column2: played by Peter Jackson. Jackson reprised a similar character at the beginning of The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
column3: again appearing outside the Prancing Pony eating a carrot.
